Many thanks for the reply. 

I am relieved to know that I am not the only o=
ne having difficulties
to compile heritrix. I thought I was doing something=
 wrong, but it
seems like it's not the case.

I'd be very happy to see a ne=
w tutorial on how to set up the latest
heritrix in an Eclipse environment a=
nd getting it to compile... until
then.

I've tried several options and rea=
d all the tutorials on the wiki
without success. I tried running maven from=
 the command line, from
M2Eclipse, etc. and I keep getting errors.

If anyo=
ne is able to successfully compile heritrix, let us know (how) !

--- In ar=

<nfoscarini@...> wrote:=

will not work for me.

d have better results from the command line, but not anything
usable.
>

Running "maven install" on the main pom.xml only works if I manually
run "m=

install" on the m=
ain pom.xml always reports a failed build but least
it does a lot of work b=
efore failing.
>

ing jar files
from the local user repository.

to get Eclipse to compile the code, and run
Heritrix, but only if I used th=
e war file from the release package on

e of my code changes would appear
